about_the_game:
Welcome to Banana & Tomato World!
Banana & Tomato is a clicker game where you collect unique Banamato items to build a special collection.
Drop System: Get a Banamato item every 3 hours automatically. Special effects and sounds will alert you when you receive an item so you never miss your beautiful moments!
Mini Games: Play a minigame once an hour to get even more items and a great chance to win unique items you can use to increase your clicks. We are working hard to implement more fun minigames ASAP!
Drop Chances: Increase your chances of getting rare items by clicking more. Click, level up and win!
Inventory: Use your collected items as skins for your Banamato. Open the inventory and equip the desired skin. Consume special items won in the minigame to get even more clicks, thus, more chances to win better items!
Achievements: Collect various challenging achievements in the game.
P.S. New skins, features, and minigames are in development. Stay tuned!
Feedback: We value your opinion! Share your thoughts and suggestions in the reviews or email us. We respond to every opinion we receive!
With love,
Banana & Tomato Team! Good luck! <3

Banana & Tomato is a clicker game where you collect unique Banamato items to build a special collection.
Drop System: Get a Banamato item every 3 hours automatically. Special effects and sounds will alert you when you receive an item so you never miss your beautiful moments!

Inventory: Use your collected items as skins for your Banamato. Open the inventory and equip the desired skin. Consume special items won in the minigame to get even more clicks, thus, more chances to win better items!

name: Banana & Tomato

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Banana & Tomato is a fun clicker game! Click Banamatos, get and collect unique items, play minigames and get even more, click and level up for better rewards, change Banamato skins, earn rare achievements, and much more! Read the full description to learn about all the exciting features!
